comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: I think the artist you are thinking of is Walter Sickert. The author Patricia Cornwall has recently written a book, entitled Portrait of a Killer: Jack the Ripper Case Closed, which claims Sickert was Jack the Ripper. Here are a few articles you can read if interested: http://www.trutv.com/library/crime/serial_killers/notorious/ripper/sickert_18.html www.guardian.co.uk/artanddesign/2001/dec/08/art.artsfeatures Thanks for your interest!!
